name: Iron Man Simulator
description:
Witness your favorite superhero franchise reimagined and revitalized in an all new action-packed adventure.

The legendary Biocide Entertainment Studios™ presents to you the most intimidating, controversial and all around most gargantuan title of the 21st century: Iron man simulator. Experience Tony Stark’s immense struggle and badassery as you attempt to escape from your captivity in Afghanistan. Needless to say it’s unclear whether you’ll survive. 

For a limited time you too can join the ranks of video game history and claim your copy before its too late. 

Select your operating system and hit the download button below to let your initiation begin!
